Name: Small room
Description: This room is very sparse. The bed here is broken, the room does not have any windows and there's only a single door to the east.

Name: Basement
Description:
An old damp basement strewn about with junk. To the north is a set of stairs leading up.
To the south is a heavy security door marked with a purple triangle.

Name: Hallway
Description: A well-kempt and lit hallway. You see stairs leading down to the south, and doors leading east and north.

Name: Study
Description: The air in this room reeks of the smell of mold and mildew from the myriad of books covering the bookshelves. You see doors leading to the north and to the west.

Name: Kitchen
Description: A large, now abandoned, kitchen in complete disarray. You see doors leading in all directions.

Name: Storage Room
Description: This small room has been used to store a variety of goods for use in the kitchen.

Name: Dining Room
Description: Before you is an elegant dining room, with two long tables prepared for a dinner worthy of high society. It does not appear as if anyone has used it in a long time. You see doors leading in all directions.

Name: Bathroom
Description: This is a bathroom. You see a door to the west.

Name: Entry hallway
Description: This is a hallway. You see doors leading to the north, south and east.

Name: Living Room
Description: This is a living room. You see doors to the south and the west.

Name: Foyer
Description: This is a foyer. You see doors to the south and the west.

Name: Clothing Storage
Description: This is a clothing storage. You see a door to the east.

Name: Upper hallway
Description: This is a hallway. You see doors leading in all directions.

Name: Bedroom
Description: This is a bedroom. You see a door to the west.

Name: Guest bedroom
Description: This is a guest bedroom. You see a door to the east.

Name: Master bedroom
Description: This is the master bedroom. You see a door to the south.

Name: Outside
Description: You have managed to escape the house, congratulations!
